Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
narcissistic \narcissistic\ adj. Having an excessive love of oneself; egocentric; egoistic.
Syn: egotistic, egotistical, self-loving. [WordNet 1.5]
narcissistic adj : characteristic of those having an inflated idea of their own importance [syn: {egotistic}, {egotistical}, {self-loving}]
